messages.content: I have been asked by local residents to stand again in this election to be a strong advocate for our community. I want to do this again - for all the people all of the time.

mentions.tacticalSituation: For decades, all elections in our area have been between Liberal Democrats and Labour. In 2015, the general election saw a Labour MP elected here for the first time in decades. Now we have another chance to stop the election of a Labour MP, but only if enough people vote for me.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud of my record and have enclosed my personal biography for your consideration. I hope you will now be able to support me on 8th June.

images.caption: SIMON HUGHES For Bermondsey and Old Southwark
